column2: we were finally given a table but was given a rude dismissal by the (previously friendly) waitress at the wine bar
column3: possibly because we couldn't close our ticket nor tip her in cash (because we didn't have any). Final note to close it all up
column4: we noticed a couple of tables beside us that were empty the entire time until a couple was seated next to us at 6:30PM SHARP
column5: which is when the social hour ended. We overheard the sad
column6: distraught couple next to us pleading to order from the social hour menu as they have waited 1 hour in the patio. Well
column8: but we think that incident was either an intentional lure/bait scheme
column9: or just plain inefficiency in the seating management system/service.
